snippet: CURTISS--Nicholas E.,of Sarasota, FL and Chatham, MA, died March 24 at the age of 88. He is survived by his wife June, three sons and four grandchildren. 1/3
lead_paragraph: CURTISS--Nicholas E.,of Sarasota, FL and Chatham, MA, died March 24 at the age of 88. He is survived by his wife June, three sons and four grandchildren. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  CURTISS, NICHOLAS E.
